question: Show news articles and feature articles with 1000 word count.
sql_query1:
SELECT News_Articles.title
FROM News_Articles
WHERE News_Articles.Word_Count = 1000
UNION
SELECT Feature_Articles.title
FROM Feature_Articles
WHERE Feature_Articles.Word_Count = 1000
sql_query2:
SELECT News_Articles.title
FROM News_Articles
UNION
SELECT Feature_Articles.title
FROM Feature_Articles
WHERE Feature_Articles.Word_Count = 1000
interpretation1: What news articles have 1000 word count and what feature articles have same word count?
interpretation2: List all news articles and also list feature articles with word count of 1000.
